001package edu.cnm.deepdive.zoomattendance.service;
002
003import android.content.Context;
004import android.util.Base64;
005import android.util.Log;
006import androidx.lifecycle.LiveData;
007import dagger.hilt.android.qualifiers.ApplicationContext;
008import edu.cnm.deepdive.zoomattendance.R;
009import edu.cnm.deepdive.zoomattendance.model.dao.StudentDao;
010import edu.cnm.deepdive.zoomattendance.model.dao.ZoomMeetingDao;
011import edu.cnm.deepdive.zoomattendance.model.dto.Authentication;
012import edu.cnm.deepdive.zoomattendance.model.dto.Meeting;
013import edu.cnm.deepdive.zoomattendance.model.dto.MeetingDetailsResponse;
014import edu.cnm.deepdive.zoomattendance.model.dto.MeetingListResponse;
015import edu.cnm.deepdive.zoomattendance.model.dto.MeetingParticipantsResponse;
016import edu.cnm.deepdive.zoomattendance.model.dto.Participant;
017import edu.cnm.deepdive.zoomattendance.model.dto.UserListResponse;
018import edu.cnm.deepdive.zoomattendance.model.dto.UserResponse;
019import edu.cnm.deepdive.zoomattendance.model.entity.Student;
020import edu.cnm.deepdive.zoomattendance.model.entity.ZoomMeeting;
021import io.reactivex.rxjava3.core.Completable;
022import io.reactivex.rxjava3.core.Observable;
023import io.reactivex.rxjava3.core.Single;
024import io.reactivex.rxjava3.schedulers.Schedulers;
025import java.nio.charset.StandardCharsets;
026import java.text.DateFormat;
027import java.text.SimpleDateFormat;
028import java.time.Instant;
029import java.util.Date;
030import java.util.LinkedList;
031import java.util.List;
032import java.util.stream.Collectors;
033import javax.inject.Inject;
034import javax.inject.Singleton;
035
036@Singleton
037public class ZoomMeetingRepository {
038
039  private static final String DATE_FORMAT = "yyyy-MM-dd";
040  private static final int PAGE_SIZE = 300;
041
042  private final ZoomMeetingDao zoomMeetingDao;
043  private final StudentDao studentDao;
044  private final ZoomAuthProxy authProxy;
045  private final ZoomApiProxy apiProxy;
046  private final String accountId;
047  private final String clientId;
048  private final String clientSecret;
049  private final DateFormat dateFormat;
050
051  private Authentication authentication;
052  private UserResponse userResponse;
053
054  @Inject
055  public ZoomMeetingRepository(@ApplicationContext Context context, ZoomMeetingDao zoomMeetingDao,
056      StudentDao studentDao, ZoomAuthProxy authProxy, ZoomApiProxy apiProxy) {
057    this.zoomMeetingDao = zoomMeetingDao;
058    this.studentDao = studentDao;
059    this.authProxy = authProxy;
060    this.apiProxy = apiProxy;
061    accountId = context.getString(R.string.account_id);
062    clientId = context.getString(R.string.client_id);
063    clientSecret = context.getString(R.string.client_secret);
064    dateFormat = new SimpleDateFormat(DATE_FORMAT);
065  }
066
067  public Single<Authentication> authenticate() {
068    byte[] bytes = (clientId + ':' + clientSecret).getBytes(StandardCharsets.UTF_8);
069    String authorization = Base64.encodeToString(bytes, Base64.NO_WRAP);
070    return authProxy.authenticate("Basic " + authorization, accountId, "account_credentials")
071        .flatMap((auth) -> apiProxy
072            .listUsers("Bearer " + auth.getToken(), "", PAGE_SIZE)
073            .map(userListResponse -> {
074              userResponse = userListResponse.getUsers()
075                  .get(0);// FIXME Don't assume first user is the one we want.
076              return auth;
077            })
078        )
079        .subscribeOn(Schedulers.io())
080        .doOnSuccess(auth -> authentication = auth);
081
082  }
083
084  public Single<ZoomMeeting> insert(ZoomMeeting zoomMeeting) {
085    return zoomMeetingDao
086        .insert(zoomMeeting)
087        .map(id -> {
088          zoomMeeting.setId(id);
089          return zoomMeeting;
090        })
091        .subscribeOn(Schedulers.io());
092  }
093
094  public Completable delete(ZoomMeeting zoomMeeting) {
095    return zoomMeetingDao
096        .delete(zoomMeeting)
097        .ignoreElement()
098        .subscribeOn(Schedulers.io());
099  }
100
101  public LiveData<ZoomMeeting> select(long id) {
102    return zoomMeetingDao.select(id);
103  }
104
105  public LiveData<List<ZoomMeeting>> selectByStudentId(long studentId) {
106    return zoomMeetingDao.selectByStudentId(studentId);
107  }
108
109  public LiveData<List<ZoomMeeting>> get() {
110    return zoomMeetingDao.get();
111  }
112
113  ;
114
115  public Single<? extends List<ZoomMeeting>> list(String userId) {
116    return Single.just(
117            new LinkedList<ZoomMeeting>(/* TODO Invoke proxy method to construct a request for a meeting list */))
118        .map((meetings) -> meetings /* TODO Store return meetings in database  */);
119  }
120
121  private Single<String> refresh() {
122    return (
123        (authentication != null && authentication.expiration().after(new Date()))
124            ? Single.just("Bearer " + authentication.getToken())
125            : authenticate().map((auth) -> "Bearer " + auth.getToken())
126    )
127        .subscribeOn(Schedulers.io());
128  }
129
130  public Single<List<Meeting>> fetchMeetings(Date from, Date to) {
131    return refresh()
132        .flatMap(
133            token -> apiProxy.listMeetings(token, userResponse.getId(), "", dateFormat.format(from),
134                dateFormat.format(to), PAGE_SIZE, "scheduled"))
135        .map(MeetingListResponse::getMeetings);
136  }
137
138  public Completable observeMeetings(Date from, Date to) {
139    return fetchMeetings(from, to)
140        .flatMapObservable(Observable::fromIterable)
141        .map((meeting) -> {
142          ZoomMeeting zoomMeeting = new ZoomMeeting();
143          zoomMeeting.setCreated(Instant.ofEpochMilli(meeting.getCreated().getTime()));
144          zoomMeeting.setStarted(Instant.ofEpochMilli(meeting.getStart().getTime()));
145          zoomMeeting.setUuid(meeting.getUuid());
146          zoomMeeting.setDuration(meeting.getDuration() * 60);
147          zoomMeeting.setTopic(meeting.getTopic());
148          return zoomMeeting;
149        })
150        .collect(Collectors.toList())
151        .flatMap(zoomMeetingDao::insert)
152        .ignoreElement();
153  }
154
155  public Completable observeMeetingsAndParticipants(Date from, Date to) {
156    return fetchMeetings(from, to)
157        .flatMapObservable(Observable::fromIterable)
158        .doOnNext((meeting) -> Log.d(getClass().getSimpleName(), meeting.toString()))
159        .flatMap(meeting -> apiProxy.listParticipants("Bearer " + authentication.getToken(),
160                meeting.getUuid(), "")
161            .map(MeetingParticipantsResponse::getParticipants)
162            .flatMapObservable(Observable::fromIterable)
163            .doOnNext((participant) ->
164                Log.d(getClass().getSimpleName(), participant.toString()))
165            .flatMap((participant) ->
166                addOrRetrieve(participant)
167                    .flatMap((student) -> zoomMeetingDao
168                        .selectByStudentAndUUID(student.getId(), meeting.getUuid())
169                        .switchIfEmpty(
170                            Single.fromSupplier(() -> {
171                                  ZoomMeeting zoomMeeting = new ZoomMeeting();
172                                  zoomMeeting.setStudentId(student.getId());
173                                  zoomMeeting.setUuid(meeting.getUuid());
174                                  zoomMeeting.setStarted(
175                                      Instant.ofEpochMilli(meeting.getStart().getTime()));
176                                  zoomMeeting.setDuration(participant.getDuration());
177                                  return zoomMeeting;
178                                })
179                                .flatMap((zoomMeeting) -> zoomMeetingDao
180                                    .insert(zoomMeeting)
181                                    .map((id) -> {
182                                      zoomMeeting.setId(id);
183                                      return zoomMeeting;
184                                    })
185                                )
186                        )
187                    )
188                    .toObservable()
189            )
190        )
191        .ignoreElements();
192  }
193
194  private Single<Student> addOrRetrieve(Participant participant) {
195    return
196        studentDao
197            .selectByName(participant.getName())
198            .switchIfEmpty(
199                Single.fromSupplier(() -> {
200                      Student student = new Student();
201                      student.setName(participant.getName());
202                      return student;
203                    })
204                    .flatMap(
205                        (student) -> studentDao.insert(student)
206                            .map((id) -> {
207                              student.setId(id);
208                              return student;
209                            })
210                    )
211            );
212  }
213
214  public Single<MeetingDetailsResponse> fetchMeeting(long meetingId) {
215    return refresh()
216        .flatMap((token) -> apiProxy.getDetails(token, meetingId));
217  }
218}
